displayRightsChoiceMatrix() displayRightsChoiceMatrixProfile ProfiledisplayRightsChoiceMatrix
displayRightsChoiceMatrix (array $rights, array $options = [] )
Display rights choice matrix
Depuis
0.85
Paramètres
$rights
array possible: 'itemtype' => the type of the item to check (as passed to self::getRightsFor()) 'rights' => when use of self::getRightsFor() is impossible 'label' => the label for the right 'field' => the name of the field inside the DB and HTML form (prefixed by '_') 'html_field' => when $html_field != '_'.$field
$options
array possible: 'title' the title of the matrix 'canedit' 'default_class' the default CSS class used for the row
Renvoie
integer random value used to generate the ids

dropdownRight() dropdownRightProfile ProfiledropdownRight
static dropdownRight ( $name, $options = [] )[static]
Make a select box for a None Read Write choice
Depuis
0.84
Paramètres
$name
select name
$options
array of possible options:
value : preselected value.
nonone : hide none choice ? (default false)
noread : hide read choice ? (default false)
nowrite : hide write choice ? (default false)
display : display or get string (default true)
rand : specific rand (default is generated one)
Renvoie
integer|string integer if option display=true (random part of elements id) string if option display=false (HTML code)

'display' 'check_method' method used to check the right

getRightsForForm() getRightsForFormProfile ProfilegetRightsForForm
static getRightsForForm (string $interface = 'all' , string $form = 'all' , string $group = 'all' )[static]
Get all rights to display for a specific form and interface.
This is only used for GLPI core rights and not rights added by plugins.
Paramètres
string$form
The tab/form name @phpstan-param non-empty-string $form
string$interface
The interface name @phpstan-param 'central'|'helpdesk' $interface
Renvoie
array @phpstan-type RightDefinition = array{rights: array{}, label: string, field: string, scope: string} @phpstan-return $interface == 'all' ? array<string, array<string, array<string, RightDefinition[]>>> : ($form == 'all' ? array<string, array<string, RightDefinition[]>> : ($group == 'all' ? array<string, RightDefinition[]> : RightDefinition[]))
Helper function to streamline rights definition
Paramètres
class-string<CommonDBTM>|null
$itemtype
string$interface
array$options
Renvoie
array
